name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 21, in Handan, Hebei, all the teachers of Shuguang No. 2 Primary School wrote a letter of appeal because the interests of teachers were damaged due to the fact that the Shuguang No. 2 Primary School, which was originally part of Congtai District, was transferred to the Economic Development Zone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 22, Harbin, Heilongjiang. Junhao Yiwu City was left unfinished, and owners gathered at the sales office to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 21, Shenzhen, Guangdong. A worker at Haixing Technology Co., Ltd. suddenly started shouting "Fight the Japanese devils, long live Chairman Mao!"
According to the video poster, the factory has to work thirteen hours a day

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 22, a white car crashed into a roadside guardrail near Wanda Plaza in Zhenjiang, Jiangsu, and a wounded person fell to the ground. The person who filmed the accident said, "The person was thrown out directly."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of March 23, an explosion occurred in a residential building in Shizi Town, Dazhu, Dazhou, Sichuan, leaving the scene in a mess.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the terrorist attack in Moscow, a short video blogger said that the price of air tickets from Moscow to China has skyrocketed. "Some time ago, the round-trip ticket from Beijing to Moscow was only about 4,000 yuan, but today the one-way ticket has risen to 10,000 or 20,000 yuan."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 23, a 34-year-old programmer posted a video saying that he had worked at Huawei for three and a half years, had no more than five weekends off, and did not get home until after 10:30 p.m. Even when he got home, he had to continue working. He said that working at Huawei "almost made me depressed."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 22, Anshan, Liaoning. A man holding a sharp knife stood on the edge of the roof of Silong Plaza and attempted to jump off the building.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 20, in a restaurant at the Yuhe Expressway exit in Shaanxi Province, a uniformed staff member had an argument with a truck driver in the store, then poured his food into the trash can in the store, and strangled the driver's neck, forcing the driver to pick up the food from the trash can and eat it.
According to the restaurant owner, the uniformed man was a staff member of the Yuhe toll station.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A media reporter called the Shanxi Provincial Department of Transportation, and the staff on duty said they did not know the situation. The phone at the Yuhe toll station was always busy, and the local police station refused to disclose the situation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 22, in Yangpu District, Shanghai, several unidentified people broke into an elderly person’s house and forcibly took two elderly people away.
It is reported that the elderly had gone to Beijing to petition
